name: Forest Guardians
description:
Controls

  • Move: WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Take Picture: Left Mouse Button / Space Bar
  • Aim Picture: Mouse Position

 Explore the deep and dark forest with the flash of your camera as your only source of light! You must remain stealthy and undetected by sneaking up behind the creatures if you want to live to tell the world of your discoveries! 

Asset List:

Player Sprite - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/angie-fashion-2d-female-spri...

Groundtile - https://pixiatrist.itch.io/amazingtilesetground1

Trees - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/nature/treepack1-fre...

Enemy Sprite Art by - Archnila

Programming by - oHoodie & Fusyon

Audio & Level Design by - Pheron
